entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Flurries at times heavy beginning after midnight. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023
